TopicTitle: Set controlgroups on ship/station already in flight

Articles.Content:
Is there a way to set the controlgroups on a ship that is already orbitting around Kerbin?

I started building my first LKO Refueling Station and just now noticed not all my solar panels are correctly bound to controlgroups...

I'd hate to lift and dock all that stuff all over again, so i'd rather just change the controlgroups by editing a savefile or something, but i have no idea where to look.

Cheers

Edited November 6, 2013 by Knobby
IF you are not adverse to mods you can get Actions on the fly I use it and it works just fine in .22
As far as I know, there isn't. But try that mod Taki117 suggested. I play without them, so I would call myself screwed at that point.
The mod is a little wonky to work with, but it gets the job done.
